description.displayText: Rachel is an absolutely wonderful nanny. I cannot say enough. Always on time, flexible, smart, honest and SO GREAT with kids. She truly cares about their well being  and growth. She  helped my kids reflect on their actions, manage their behaviors  and also helped them with their homework and develop independent skills. My kids absolutely love her. Her next family will be SO lucky to have her.
